42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying :Faith has over seventy branches, the most excellent of which is the declaration that there is no god but Allah, and the humblest of which is the removal of a bone from the road. And modesty is a branch of faith
